scripts.build: yarn run build:clean && yarn run build:ast && yarn run build:parser && yarn run build:dist && yarn run build:flow
scripts.build:ast: yarn run -s generate-ast --builtin Encoding --builtin Precision --builtin UnaryOp --builtin BinaryOp --builtin GeneratedColumnMode --builtin Direction --builtin MatchMode --builtin ReferenceOption --builtin IndexKind --builtin IndexType src/ast/ast.grammar src/ast/index.js && import-sort --write src/ast/index.js && prettier --write src/ast/index.js
scripts.check: yarn run check:eslint && yarn run check:prettier && yarn run check:import-sort
scripts.test: ./test.sh -s utf8 && yarn run -s check && yarn run -s flow && jest src
scripts.actually-prepublish: yarn run build && yarn run test && yarn run build
scripts.format: yarn run -s eslint --fix --report-unused-disable-directives src && yarn run -s import-sort --write 'src/**/*.js' && yarn run -s prettier --write 'src/**/*.js' 'src/**/*.pegjs' '!src/parser/mysql.js'
